Son hank should be in charge. Son hank would win championships. Take heed put hal, and cashman, and Girard in a uhaul truck one way to Tampa where they belong in the minors. Put hank in the big Apple where he belongs. And hire loud piniella, don baylor, city gaston, or buck showalter. We would win a championship very soon. Also hire Dan duquette as general manager.
